Frame color: Gold

The Ray-Ban La Havana Aviator reimagines the most iconic sunglass models in the world in a brand new rhythm and style. La Havana Aviator comes with original grey or green crystal lenses in a classic gold metal frames with Havana acetate details on the temple tips. This Aviator embraces the vibe of old Havana in a brand new Ray-Ban rhythm while keeping the iconic style, quality and comfort of the original.

Frame Material: Metal

Frame Color: Gold

Lenses: Grey Gradient

Shape: Pilot

Size Lens-Bridge: 58 14

Temple Length: 135
